title: Fragment, 9th–12th century
medium:
Medium: wool
Technique: tapestry weave (plain weave) with eccentric weft
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 17.8 x 23.5 cm (7 in. x 9 1/4 in.)
description: Center band has animal figures, flanked on each side by bands of interlacing pattern. Two human figures at selvedge edge.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 9th–12th century.
9th–12th century. Medium: wool
